Message Format: Field                        Bytes      Type       Index version                      4          uint32     0 sourceDomain                 4          uint32     4 destinationDomain            4          uint32     8 nonce                        32         bytes32    12 sender                       32         bytes32    44 recipient                    32         bytes32    76 destinationCaller            32         bytes32    108 minFinalityThreshold         4          uint32     140 finalityThresholdExecuted    4          uint32     144 messageBody                  dynamic    bytes      148","params":{"attestation":"Concatenated 65-byte signature(s) of `message`, in increasing order of the attester address recovered from signatures.","message":"Message bytes"},"returns":{"success":"True, if successful; acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

attesterManager().details: Returns the address of the attester manager

params._localDomain: Domain of chain on which the contract is deployed

disableAttester(address).details: Only callable by attesterManager. Disabling the attester is not allowed if there is only one attester enabled, or if it would cause the number of enabled attesters to become less than signatureThreshold. (Attester must be currently enabled.)

enableAttester(address).details: Only callable by attesterManager. New attester must be nonzero, and currently disabled.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: Owner, pauser, rescuer, attesterManager, and attesters must be non-zero.Signature threshold must be non-zero, but not exceed the number of enabled attesters

params.attester: attester to check enabled status of

returns._0: true if given `attester` is enabled, else false

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

receiveMessage(bytes,bytes).details: Attestation format: A valid attestation is the concatenated 65-byte signature(s) of exactly `thresholdSignature` signatures, in increasing order of attester address. ***If the attester addresses recovered from signatures are not in increasing order, signature verification will fail.*** If incorrect number of signatures or duplicate signatures are supplied, signature verification will fail. Message Format: Field                        Bytes      Type       Index version                      4          uint32     0 sourceDomain                 4          uint32     4 destinationDomain            4          uint32     8 nonce                        32         bytes32    12 sender                       32         bytes32    44 recipient                    32         bytes32    76 destinationCaller            32         bytes32    108 minFinalityThreshold         4          uint32     140 finalityThresholdExecuted    4          uint32     144 messageBody                  dynamic    bytes      148

params.attestation: Concatenated 65-byte signature(s) of `message`, in increasing order of the attester address recovered from signatures.

returns.success: True, if successful; false, if not

sendMessage(uint32,bytes32,bytes32,uint3.details: Formats the message, and emits a `MessageSent` event with message information.

params.destinationCaller: Caller on the destination domain, as bytes32
params.minFinalityThreshold: The minimum finality at which the message should be attested to
params.recipient: Address of message recipient on destination chain as bytes32

setMaxMessageBodySize(uint256).details: This value should not be reduced without good reason, to avoid impacting users who rely on large messages.

params.newMaxMessageBodySize: new max message body size, in bytes

setSignatureThreshold(uint256).details: new signature threshold must be nonzero, and must not exceed number of enabled attesters.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

updateAttesterManager(address).details: Allows the current attester manager to transfer control of the contract to a newAttesterManager.

params.newAttesterManager: The address to update attester manager to.

getNumEnabledAttesters().notice: returns the number of enabled attesters

isEnabledAttester(address).notice: returns true if given `attester` is enabled, else false

receiveMessage(bytes,bytes).notice: Receive a message. Messages can only be broadcast once for a given nonce. The message body of a valid message is passed to the specified recipient for further processing.

rescueERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Rescue ERC20 tokens locked up in this contract.

sendMessage(uint32,bytes32,bytes32,uint3.notice: Send the message to the destination domain and recipient

setMaxMessageBodySize(uint256).notice: Sets the max message body size

setSignatureThreshold(uint256).notice: Sets the threshold of signatures required to attest to a message. (This is the m in m/n multisig.)

updateRescuer(address).notice: Assign the rescuer role to a given address.
